display.title: Red Morningstar
display.description:
Using the power of Red Matter to combine the functions of the Red Matter Hammer, Red Matter Pickax, and Red Matter Shovel into a single tool. 

The Red Morningstar can quickly harvest most blocks under the ground (left click). 

Like the Red Matter Pickaxe it can harvest a whole vein of ore in a single action (right click). 

Like the Red Matter Hammer it can harvest all blocks in an area based on the charge level. 

Like the Red Matter Shovel it will harvest a large area of dirt based on charge or a whole vein of gravel.
